segments.text: Can you tell me where it hurts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so glad they called you . It feels like something is really wrong with my stomach !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it hurt when I push here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It â€™ s mostly on my right side . Right here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you been feeling this way for awhile ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I started feeling kind of sick last night after dinner , but this morning the pain got really bad !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you eaten anything unusual lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are going to take you to an emergency room right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will feel better when I know what the problem is . Thank you for the drugs .
segments.speaker: S2
